title: Ridley’s 100 Single Cheesy Joke Cards – Includes 100 Jokes for Kids and Adults, Funny Jokes for Family-Friendly Fun – Makes a Great Gift Idea
features: FUNNY JOKE CARDS – The laughter will go on and on with Ridley's 100 Cheesy Joke Cards for Adults and Kids – it’s a set of 100 silly jokes packaged like slices of cheese.

FUN FOR ALL AGES – This set of joke cards is a great conversation starter for any party or family fun night. It’s recommended for kids and adults of all ages. Bring it to your next get together and get ready to laugh!

INCLUDES – This box of jokes for kids and adults includes 100 cheesy jokes to brighten up your day. Individual joke cards measure 5” W x 3” L and are stored in a durable paper box to keep them safe in storage and while on the go.
MAKES A GREAT GIFT IDEA – Always bring the good time with this set of jokes. It makes a great gift for any funny family member or friend who can’t resist a good family-friendly joke.
RIDLEY’S – Ridley’s invents exciting, original, quality games and toys to spark imaginations, banish boredom and open up a world of immense fun.
